name: Pipe constructor

The "connecting tube" intended for use in the game field allows you to go through all levels of the puzzle game "Pipe Designer". Before you open more than 2000 levels, go through them all. Maybe a plumber is your calling. Water is the power of life, ask it the right flow. The plumber rules.

Bored on the way to school or to work? Are you waiting for friends who are late? Maybe you are stuck in a "traffic jam"? Or, your turn will not be soon? Take with you a fascinating game. The pipe designer will take you to an amazing world of games. The water pipe is waiting for you.
